mean_cn: adj. 摄氏的，百分度的；  n. 摄氏度
mean_en: relating to, conforming to, or having a thermometric scale on which the interval between the freezing point of water and the boiling point of water is divided into 100 degrees with 0° representing the freezing point and 100° the boiling point
word_etyma: centi一百 + grade刻度 → centigrade 百分度的
sentence: Flowers would be nicely treated at 25 degrees centigrade.
